The story is pretty ok
Copper and his kid seemed to be good in the first act and [spoiler]Him seeing his old lady daughter was a good scene.
But ghost dad kinda ruined a solid science film, like adding In ancient aliens to the history channel[/spoiler]

But I enjoy the science and the visuals a lot.
